name: Alien Extermination Team (3D FPS Project Full)
name_original: Alien Extermination Team (3D FPS Project Full)
description:
This is my completed 3D Shooter/FPS Project.

Modifications:
- Created a "character selection system." There are two characters to choose from, and they have different properties from each other. These are detailed on the Character Select page (from clicking the New Game button) and the Character Info page. (They also have different "hurt" sounds).
- Created two completely new and unique levels (both of Mya's levels). This means, each character gets two levels to themselves.
- The first level of the tutorial (Etan's first level) was upgraded to be more unique. Both of the tutorial levels were made more visual with props (both of Etan's levels).
- Fixed the pistol with a reskin from provided assets and various other minor changes. For some reason in the assets package provided, the default pistol was super buggy.

Credits
Created by Elex McCoy
Assets provided by MSU
Character art by Erika Chee
